sentences.english: Simultaneous interpretation and Hong Kong sign interpretation are available for Core Sessions.

sentences.english: He's an interpreter for the government.
And they did not know that Joseph understood, for there was an interpreter between them.

sentences.english: Simultaneous interpreting (SI) is a complex multi-task activity of interpreting which came into exsistance after the Nuremberg trials.

sentences.english: I am able to take dictation in English and translate it rapidly into Dhellonese.

sentences.english: For the first time it is interpreted simultaneously in Arabic.

sentences.english: Interpreting simultaneously requires a great deal of mental concentration and agility.

sentences.english: The conference hall is provided with facilities for simultaneous interpretation in five languages.

sentences.english: Among all categories of translation, simultaneous interpretation is the hardest.
sentences.chinese: 同声传译是各种翻译活动中最难作的一种翻译。
